The Katniss Rose Gown is crafted from beautiful velvet fabric and adorned with handmade stretch satin rosettes along the back plunging neckline. Wear this look to your next formal gathering, gala or a red carpet event.
• Velvet, stretch satin • Lined bodice, cups, boning • Handmade rosettes • Hidden back zipper • Style: 1066993 • Model is 5'9" wearing size US 2
item.title: Katniss wine Rose Gown

item.description:
Introducing the Aviva Gown. This captivating one-shoulder design is cut from beautiful fil coupé fabric, featuring two adjustable spaghetti straps and a romantic pleated ruffle skirt. The perfect style for your next formal soiree.
• Fil coupé • Fully lined, cups, boning • Adjustable spaghetti straps • Hidden back zipper • Style: 1067003 • Model is 5'9" wearing size US 2

item.description:
Turn heads at your next formal function wearing the Stella Lace Gown. This beautiful strapless number combines a subtle sweetheart neckline and a pleated floor-length A-line skirt with a leg slit. It is the perfect dress for any formal event.
• Lace • Fully lined, cups, boning • Removable spaghetti straps • Hidden back zipper • Style: 1069002 • Model is 5'9" wearing size US 2
